primitiveValues.textValue: How do I fund my business account?

ConversationMessageDefinition.label: How do I fund my business account?

primitiveValues.formulaTemplate: How do I fund my business account? - Click on your username in the top right. - Once the panel has opened up, select your business account. - Once the business account has been selected, click on Deposit, then select either Interac E-transfer or wire-transfer. - A unique message code will be displayed in the big red box. - Copy the unique code and put it as a 'message' on your E-Transfer to ensure your funds get deposited into the business account. - For wire-transfers, our operations team processes the wire to the business account if the wire was sent from a business bank account.
